players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone's intentions in this game."
Charlie: "I'm glad we all seem to have a clear suspicion now. Let's keep an open mind and continue investigating each other to ensure the truth comes out."
Bob: "I will stick to my investigation and continue to gather evidence. The mafioso must be stopped, no matter who they are."
You: "Let's all work together to uncover the truth. We need more information before jumping to conclusions."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
